title: Boris Johnson – 2020 Joint Statement with France and Germany on the Situation in Iran
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the joint statement made between Boris Johnson, the British Prime Minister, Angela Merkel, the German Chancellor, and Emmanuel Macron, the French President, issued on 6 January 2020.
content:
We have condemned the recent attacks on coalitions forces in Iraq and are gravely concerned by the negative role Iran has played in the region, including through the IRGC and the Al-Qods force under the command of General Soleimani.
